1) Linux example:

Linux server run log (stdout):
-bash-4.2$ python3 server-pa02.py
States.CLOSED -> States.LISTEN
00000000000000000000000000010010 : seq = 18
00000000000000000000000000000000 : ack = 0
10000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 0, fin = 0
00000000000000000000000000010010 : seq = 18
00000000000000000000000000000000 : ack = 0
10000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 0, fin = 0

connection startup: ('127.0.0.1', 39573)
00000000000000000000000000000000 : seq = 0
00000000000000000000000000010011 : ack = 19
11000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 1, fin = 0
sent response with ack= 19 seq= 0
States.LISTEN -> States.SYN_RECEIVED

Client run log (stdout):

-bash-4.2$ python3 client-pa02.py
send handshake
00000000000000000000000000010010 : seq = 18
00000000000000000000000000000000 : ack = 0
10000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 0, fin = 0
States.CLOSED -> States.SYN_SENT
subproc start in function
received subproc header:
00000000000000000000000000000000 : seq = 0
00000000000000000000000000010011 : ack = 19
11000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 1, fin = 0
00000000000000000000000000000000 : seq = 0
00000000000000000000000000010011 : ack = 19
11000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 1, fin = 0
subproc updated ack:  19
received:  19
shared variable:  <Synchronized wrapper for c_int(19)>

2) Windows example:

Server run log (stdout):

(base) C:\pa02-2021-10-24>python server.py
States.CLOSED -> States.LISTEN
00000000000000000000000000000000 : seq_num = 0
00000000000000000000000000000000 : ack_num = 0
10000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 0
00000000000000000000000000000000 : seq_num = 0
00000000000000000000000000000000 : ack_num = 0
10000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 0

connection startup: ('127.0.0.1', 58144)
00000000000000000000000000001010 : seq_num = 10
00000000000000000000000000000001 : ack_num = 1
11000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 1
sent response with ack= 1 seq= 10
States.LISTEN -> States.SYN_RECEIVED

Client run log (stdout):

(base) C:\pa02-2021-10-24>python client.py
send handshake
00000000000000000000000000000000 : seq_num = 0
00000000000000000000000000000000 : ack_num = 0
10000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 0
States.CLOSED -> States.SYN_SENT
subproc start in function
received subproc header:
00000000000000000000000000001010 : seq_num = 10
00000000000000000000000000000001 : ack_num = 1
11000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 1
00000000000000000000000000001010 : seq_num = 10
00000000000000000000000000000001 : ack_num = 1
11000000000000000000000000000000 : syn = 1, ack = 1
subproc updated ack:  1
received:  1
shared variable:  <Synchronized wrapper for c_long(1)>
